description.p: Your grudge is driven by a passionate rage born from some great failure in the past, or some deeply traumatic moment of helplessness. You seek power by testing yourself in battle against greater foes and with every trial succeeded, you claw your way further towards your ultimate objective.

At 1st level, the obsessive nature of your grudge bolsters your morale when you invoke your desire for vengeance. When you use your Wrathful Censure feature, you gain temporary hit points equal to your avenger level.

sheet.p: When you use your Wrathful Censure feature, you gain temporary hit points equal to your avenger level.

description.p: At 3rd level, your grudge enables you to channel divine energy for fueling magical effects. Each Channel Divinity option provided by your grudge explains how to use it. When you use your Channel Divinity, you choose which option to use. You must then finish a short or long rest to use your Channel Divinity again.
As a part of your Vengeful Grudge, you have the following two Channel Divinity options.

Oath of Enmity. As a bonus action, you can use your Channel Divinity to concentrate the bonds of fate between you and your current Wrathful Censure target. While this effect is active, both you and your Wrathful Censure target have disadvantage on attacks made against creatures other than you or the target. This effect lasts until the Wrathful Censure ends.

Oath of Pursuit. As a reaction when your current Wrathful Censure target ends its turn further away from you than it was at the start of its turn, you can use your Channel Divinity to enhance the censure, making the duration 8 hours, changing the maximum distance to 100 miles, and allowing you to sense the target’s exact location from where you are currently located until the censure ends.

sheet.description: You have the Oath of Enmity and Oath of Pursuit Channel Divinity options.

description.p: You can invoke a blessing of protection from your god when personal danger would threaten your mission. As a reaction when you would be hit by an attack, you can use your Channel Divinity to gain a bonus to AC equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum +2) until the end of your next turn.

description.p: You gain grudge spells at the avenger levels listed.

At 6th level, your desire for vengeance bolsters your mental state so that you approach your enemy undeterred. When you make a Wisdom and Charisma saving throw, you can spend a use of Wrathful Censure to have advantage on the saving throw.

sheet.description: When you make a Wisdom and Charisma saving throw, you can spend a use of Wrathful Censure to have advantage on the saving throw.

description.p: At 10th level, fear can no longer cause you to hesitate in exacting your revenge. You are immune to the frightened condition.

sheet.description: You are immune to the frightened condition.

description.p: At 14th level, your vengeful wrath makes escape more difficult for your censure targets. When you use your Divine Smite feature on a Wrathful Censure target, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw against your avenger spell save DC. On a failed save, the target’s speed is halved until the end of your next turn.

description.p: At 18th level, you are able to make a weapon attack against your current Wrathful Censure target as a bonus action. If you are wielding two weapons, you instead have advantage on any weapon attack you make as a bonus action against your current Wrathful Censure target.
